    • addCuttingTool

      public static int addCuttingTool​(String toolName, String toolType, String toolSeries, int toolTeeth, double toolLength)
      Parameters:
      toolName - - description for the specific tool
      toolType - - type of tool (endmill, ball nose etc.)
      toolSeries - - series (brand code) of tool
      toolTeeth - - number of teeth that the tool has
      toolLength - - the total length of the cutting tool
